name: Scandinavian Tobacco Group A/S
bossPosition: Senior Vice President, Legal ＆ Public Affairs
goal:
Scandinavian Tobacco Group is a leading manufacturer of cigars, cigarillos, pipe tobacco and fine-cut tobacco.

The Group is headquartered near Copenhagen, Denmark. STG maintains 16 sales offices globally, including in Europe and North America, and we have 12 production sites worldwide, including in Europe, Central America and the Caribbean, and Indonesia.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
The EU Tobacco Products Directive (commonly referred to as TPDII, or formally “DIRECTIVE 2014/40/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 3 April 2014 on the approximation of the laws, regulations and administrative provisions of the Member States concerning the manufacture, presentation and sale of tobacco and related products and repealing Directive 2001/37/EC”

The EU Tobacco Excise Directive (formally “COUNCIL DIRECTIVE 2011/64/EU of 21 June 2011 on the structure and rates of excise duty applied to manufactured tobacco”)
